author: Dorin Hotnogu
comment: You still can't see bottom icons on moto 360, even if the developer said it's fixed. In text viewer words should be wrapped to a rectangular area in order to be able to read them. Also font size would be very useful. No zooming on pictures. At this stage I wouldn't recommend buying it. Waiting for an update to review my rating.
title: Still needs tweaking

author: Jonathan Hine
comment: Unable to view menu across bottom of watch display. Seen this brought up for months and would think dev would fix for the watch that has the highest number of users that would use such an app. Other than that it is pretty decent with decent permissions for an unrooted device.
title: Decent but needs fix.

author: Ron Meyers
comment: Pretty useless on the Moto 360.  The Moto 360 "flat tire" hides over half of the menu and makes it nearly impossible to view and select actions from the menu.

author: Rick Michaelson
comment: Rip off. I paid for the app, it doesn't install on my S5 and Moto360. Tried to uninstall to get a refund within 15 minutes but since it won't install, I can't uninstall. Stay away from this piece of junk. Thank John Li for stealing my money.

author: Kem Sorrell
comment: Would give it a 4+ if there were some way of natively managing file extentions.
title: Sony Smartwatch 3

author: Richard Erkens
comment: The top is not visibly on the lg urbane watch
title: Lg urbane watch

author: Ricardo Trindade
comment: I really like this app, altough would be great if I could send/delete entire folders from one side to the other!

author: Suyog Vyawahare
comment: I will give 5 stars if it can open pdf files! Or zoom photos
title: Needs a PDF reader

author: Mario Dabek
comment: cant access the files on my moto 360 ??? where are they ??? im trying to send a video to my phone and cant find it once it sent to the phone
title: cant find files

author: Gustavo
comment: Does it's job but need a more intuitive GUI

author: hao liu
comment: can somebody tell me the path of file receiving folder on watch？I'm using moto360，and pls optimize the UI for round screen

reply.author: John Li
reply.content: The path of file receiving folder is the folder which you open when you send file on your Watch, you can touch the sdcard icon to change to watch storage folder to receive files.  Please send email to xuecsapp@gmail.com to get quick help.

title: cannot find the received file on watch

author: Ingo Timmermann
comment: I think for a paid app we could really expect hd icons and not those blurry ones that look like the early days of android ...apart from that it only shows the different directories but when I open one it keeps completely blank !
title: Poor graphics and doesn't work

author: Stefan Kern
comment: ... is it normal that the phone app is not able to show the data from the watch and only shows its own storage?  EDIT: After using it a while I saw that it can't delete non-empty folders. Can you fix that please? It's really annoying, I'll take the star rating back to the normal stars once this bug has been fixed :)
title: Great, but...

author: Michael Arnold
comment: Can't see SD card and couldn't see a single file or my folders. Galaxy note 3 galaxy gear live.
title: This doesn't work well

author: Phillip Hodges
comment: Can't see the bottom icons on moto 360....
title: Doesn't fit moto 360

author: Kate Middleton
comment: Really useful to transfer photo to my Gear Live, although screen is mini, it's still very usable. How can I speed up the transfer?
title: Useful to view photo on my Gear Live Watch

author: Taylor Jones
comment: I can use my Watch as usb disk with this app. Really useful!
title: Love it, Warch as USB disk.
